headline: Holiday Stress Driving Americans to Spend More, Increase Borrowing, and Pick Up Extra Jobs, New MoneyLion Survey Finds
summary: The holidays may be a time of joy, but for many Americans they also bring heightened financial pressure and stress. According to new research from MoneyLion, a leading digital ecosystem for consumer finance and part of Gen (NASDAQ: GEN), one in four Americans feel pressured to spend beyond their means during the holidays, leaving them unable to cover basic expenses.
